{{Flavour|This amulet protects its wearer from mutations, although not infallibly so.}}

Wearing an '''amulet of resist mutation''' gives the wearer a 90% chance of resisting [[mutation]]s from most sources, and reduced or no resistance to the following:
*Mutations caused due to [[magic contamination]] are only resisted 45% of the time.
*[[Potions of beneficial mutation]] ignore this amulet entirely.
*Any [[bad mutations]] inflicted by offending [[Jiyva]] ignore this amulet entirely.

==Strategy==
Bad mutations can be devastating, and these amulets are one of the few ways to protect against them. While [[potions of cure mutation]] can get rid of them, they are very rare. Thus, resist mutation is extremely helpful in [[Slime Pits]], [[Abyss]], [[Pandemonium]], and [[Zot]], where malmutation is common. In other places, malmutation is generally too rare to be worth thinking about.

Characters that use [[Haste]], [[Invisibility]], and/or [[Controlled Blink]] may want to keep one on hand, in case they get too much magical contamination. Even though resist mutation is less effective for these cases, it's better than nothing. You can swap in the amulet after you finish a fight.

==History==
*In [[0.18]], amulets of resist mutation was removed. Remaining sources of mutation resistance include [[Zin]] worship, the mutation resistance mutation, and certain artefacts such as the [[Lajatang of Order]] and [[Hat of the Alchemist]].
